snippet: Featuring artists from Turkey, Macedonia, Italy, France, the Netherlands and the United States, the ninth annual Gypsy Festival is scheduled to start on Sept. 9 in Manhattan.
abstract: Ninth annual Gypsy Festival, featuring musicians from Turkey, Macedonia, Italy, France, the Netherlands and the United States, is scheduled to begin on September 9 in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: Featuring artists from Turkey, Macedonia, Italy, France, the Netherlands and the United States, the ninth annual Gypsy Festival is scheduled to start on Sept. 9 in Manhattan.
